comment.author: 59898224@N07
comment._content: Skull of Chief Mkwawa of the Wahehe -taken by the Germans to Germany in 1898 and returned to the Wahehe in 1954

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The skull is displayed in this special case in the Mausoleum/Museum built for the purpose at Kalenga, Iringa District.
